item.title: Docker Image & docker-compose
item.description: 그럼 이제 구체적으로 실제 Docker를 사용하는 방법에 대해 정리해보도록 하자.

item.title: Remote containers in VS code
item.description: The Remote containers extention can use a Docker container as a full-featured development environment. If you want to make a remote container setup in visual studio code, there are several mandatory settings.

item.title: Element.classList
item.description:
The Element.classList is a read-only property that returns a live DOMTokenList collection of the class attributes of the element. This can then be used to manipulate the class list.

Using classList is a convenient alternative to accessing an element’s list of classes as a space-delimited string via element.className.

item.title: getElementById() vs querySelector()
item.description: When calling a specific element of an HTML file with Javascript, two methods are often used among document properties.
